mapper.select: SELECT b.blocknum FROM blocks b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT it.blockid FROM transactions_nipanft it LEFT JOIN channel c ON c.channel_genesis_hash = it.channel_genesis_hash WHERE c.name='digitalzonenipanft' GROUP BY it.blockid )t ON t.blockid = b.blocknum LEFT JOIN channel c ON c.channel_genesis_hash = b.channel_genesis_hash WHERE c.name='digitalzonenipanft' ORDER BY b.blocknum desc LIMIT 1
SELECT b.block_number FROM pending_block_operations b ORDER BY b.block_number desc LIMIT 1

SELECT b.id, b.blocknum, TO_CHAR(b.createdt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') AS createdt, b.blockhash, b.datahash, b.blksize, b.txcount, b.channel_genesis_hash FROM blocks b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT it.blockid FROM transactions_nipanft it LEFT JOIN channel c ON c.channel_genesis_hash = it.channel_genesis_hash WHERE c.name='digitalzonenipanft' GROUP BY it.blockid )t ON t.blockid = b.blocknum LEFT JOIN channel c ON c.channel_genesis_hash = b.channel_genesis_hash WHERE c.name='digitalzonenipanft' ORDER BY b.blocknum DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT b.hash, b.miner_hash, TO_CHAR(b.timestamp + interval '9 hour', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') AS timestamp, b.parent_hash, p.block_number FROM blocks b JOIN pending_block_operations p ON b.hash = p.block_hash ORDER BY b.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT b.id, b.blocknum, TO_CHAR(b.createdt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') AS createdt, b.blockhash, b.datahash, b.prehash, b.blksize, b.txcount FROM blocks b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT it.blockid FROM transactions_nipanft it LEFT JOIN channel c ON c.channel_genesis_hash = it.channel_genesis_hash WHERE c.name='digitalzonenipanft' GROUP BY it.blockid )t ON t.blockid = b.blocknum LEFT JOIN channel c ON c.channel_genesis_hash = b.channel_genesis_hash WHERE c.name='digitalzonenipanft' AND b.id=#{blNum}

SELECT b.id, b.blocknum, TO_CHAR(b.createdt, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') AS createdt, b.blockhash, b.datahash, b.blksize, b.txcount FROM blocks b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT it.blockid FROM transactions_nipanft it LEFT JOIN channel c ON c.channel_genesis_hash = it.channel_genesis_hash WHERE c.name='digitalzonenipanft' GROUP BY it.blockid )t ON t.blockid = b.blocknum LEFT JOIN channel c ON c.channel_genesis_hash = b.channel_genesis_hash WHERE c.name='digitalzonenipanft' AND b.blocknum=#{blocknum}
SELECT number as blocknum, TO_CHAR(inserted_at, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') AS createdt, hash as blockhash, size as blksize FROM blocks ORDER BY number DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET (#{pageNum}-1)*10

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM blocks b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT it.blockid FROM transactions_nipanft it LEFT JOIN channel c ON c.channel_genesis_hash = it.channel_genesis_hash WHERE c.name='digitalzonenipanft' GROUP BY it.blockid )t ON t.blockid = b.blocknum LEFT JOIN channel c ON c.channel_genesis_hash = b.channel_genesis_hash WHERE c.name='digitalzonenipanft' AND b.blockhash = #{searchWord}
